net.foxycorndog.jfoxylib.input

Class Keyboard

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.foxycorndog.jfoxylib.input.Keyboard

  • public class Keyboard
extends java.lang.Object
    Class that is used to calculate and obtain information about the Keyboard and its specific keys.
    Since:
    Apr 26, 2013 at 10:54:39 PM, v0.1
    Version:
    May 22, 2013 at 9:06:39 PM, v0.2
    Author:
    Braden Steffaniak

      • destroy

        public static void destroy()
        Destroy the keyboard and make it unusable.

      • isKeyDown

        public static boolean isKeyDown(int key)
        Get whether the specified key is pressed down at the current moment or not.
        Parameters:
        key - The key code to check if pressed or not.
        Returns:
        Whether the specified key is pressed down at the current moment or not.

      • update

        public static void update()
        Update the keyboard and all of the key status's

      • getKeyName

        public static java.lang.String getKeyName(int keyCode)
        Get the name of the key with the specified key code.
        Parameters:
        keyCode - The key code for the specified key.
        Returns:
        The name of the specified key with the specified key code.

      • getKeyCode

        public static int getKeyCode(java.lang.String name)
        Get the key code of the key with the specified name.
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the key.
        Returns:
        The key code of the key with the specified name.

      • addKeyListener

        public static boolean addKeyListener(KeyListener listener)
        Add the specified KeyListener instance to the list of Listeners that will be notified of KeyEvents.
        Parameters:
        listener - The KeyListener instance to add to the list of listeners.
        Returns:
        Whether it was successfully added to the list or not.

      • removeKeyListener

        public static boolean removeKeyListener(KeyListener listener)
        Remove the specified KeyListener instance from the list of Listeners that are notified of KeyEvents.
        Parameters:
        listener - The KeyListener instance to remove from the list of listeners.
        Returns:
        Whether it was successfully removed from the list or not.

      • isCapsLockOn

        public static boolean isCapsLockOn()
        Get whether the caps lock is on or not.
        Returns:
        Whether the caps lock is on or not.

      • getChar

        public static char getChar(int keyCode)
        Get the char that represents the keyCode (if there is one). (ONLY WORKS WITH SYMBOLS)
        Parameters:
        keyCode - The keyCode of the key.
        Returns:
        The char that represnets the keyCode.

      • shiftKey

        public static char shiftKey(char key)
        Return the character that would be equivalent to pressing shift on the specified key. (ONLY WORKS WITH NUMBERS AND SYMBOLS)
        Parameters:
        key - The key that is being simulated with a shift press.
        Returns:
        The output of the Shift+key combination.

      • getAmountOfKeys

        public static int getAmountOfKeys()
        Get the amount of keys that are available on the current Keyboard instance.
        Returns:
        The amount of keys that are available on the current Keyboard instance.
